org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.recovery
Interface IAeRecoveryProcessManager

All Superinterfaces:
IAeManager, IAeProcessManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeRecoveryProcessManager
public interface IAeRecoveryProcessManager
extends IAeProcessManager

Extends IAeProcessManager to define the interface for a process manager used by an instance of AeRecoveryEngine during recovery.
